text: It‘a a great place to chill out on any day , there’s good food available too . Owner is very friendly and nice . The food is good , the drinks are affordable the place has a very good vibe too . Most importantly, it’s kids friendly ..

I am writing to commend the wonderful attitude, helpful approach and attentiveness to service demonstrated by Mr. Ted & Mr. SK. Their dedication and attentiveness were what made me decide to go with The Hidden Bar.

With this letter I would hereby like to compliment one of your employees, Mr Teo for the excellent service he provided me during my dining and chilling hours.

His professionalism and commitment to the highest level of customer’s satisfaction has to be acknowledged.

People are an organization’s greatest asset, especially in competitive markets like Singapore’s F&B sector. On top of good food offerings, The Hidden Bar also have incredibly warm and efficient service! Having in mind such a pleasant experience with the staffs here it would be my pleasure to continue coming back in the following years.

Congratulations on having an outstanding team !
Good place to relax drink and have fun owner is friendly person and nice wld love to go all the way there and drink better then any town area
The boss and worker is friendly and helpful. Good food and envirament.if u need to chill this is the place to visit.
One of the best dining and recreational facilities in the North!! Do try the Hidden Bar and Bistro and you'll never regret it
